keyFacts: A grand jury subpoena was issued to FirstBank Puerto Rico on December 31, 2019, seeking financial records related to Jeffrey Epstein.
The bank produced 7,537 documents covering accounts for at least 25 different entities and individuals linked to Epstein.
Ghislaine Maxwell is listed as an authorized signatory for the Little St. James LLC account, directly linking her to the financial control of Epstein's private island entity.

The network of accounts shows a pattern of using corporate entities (LLCs and Incs) and trusts, with a recurring group of authorized signatories including Darren K. Indyke, Harry Beller, and Jeanne Brennan-Wiebract.
Several accounts remained open and active as late as 2019-2020, including one for 'JEFFREY EPSTEIN INDIVIDUAL CHECKING' that was closed in October 2019, after his death.
